websiteHeaderMenuText: Journal of thoughts, ideas and life experiences.

contents.value: Hello I am Aniket and I am a programmer. In my free time I like to try new skills and hobbies and this website is one of my latest endeavors. I have created this website as a medium to express myself creatively, be it designing the website itself or sharing writings, pictures and other media.
Aside from work, some of my interests include history, languages, a little bit of geography. I also like to take part in sports, specifically football, running, swimming and lately mix martial arts.

This page is still a work in progress, so I'll probably write more here future but I guess that's all for now. If you like anything about this website, do write me an email! My address at the bottom of this page. Cheers!
